PROVIDE_YOUR_EMAIL_TO_RESET_PASSWORD: Provide your email to reset your password
WE_ARE_HAPPY_TO_HAVE_YOU_ON_BOARD: We're happy to have you on board
HERO_TITLE: Get Help. Give Help. Build Community.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Connect with local helpers in your community for services, support, and friendship
ABOUT_INTRO: Local Guide is a community-driven platform that bridges the gap between people who need help and those willing to offer it. We believe in the power of local communities to support each other through everyday challenges and extraordinary moments.
ABOUT_MISSION_DESC: To create a trusted network where neighbors help neighbors, making every community stronger, more connected, and more resilient. We're breaking down barriers and building bridges between people from all walks of life.
ABOUT_VISION_DESC: A world where no one feels alone in facing challenges, where help is always just a click away, and where cultural diversity becomes a strength rather than a barrier. We envision communities where giving and receiving help is as natural as breathing.
ABOUT_VALUE1_DESC: We prioritize building strong, supportive communities where everyone feels welcome and valued.
ABOUT_VALUE2_DESC: We maintain the highest standards of safety through verification, reviews, and dedicated support.
ABOUT_VALUE3_DESC: We celebrate diversity and ensure our platform is accessible to people from all backgrounds and cultures.
ABOUT_VALUE4_DESC: We empower individuals to both give and receive help, fostering independence and mutual growth.
STEP1_DESC: Post what you need help with, from translation to city tours
STEP2_DESC: Browse available helpers or get matched with someone perfect
STEP3_DESC: Chat, meet, and complete your task together
SERVICES_TITLE: What Can We Help You With?
TESTIMONIAL1_TEXT: I found a translator within minutes! The community here is amazing and so helpful.
TESTIMONIAL2_TEXT: As a helper, I've met so many wonderful people and made great friends along the way.
TESTIMONIAL3_TEXT: The city tour I got was personalized and showed me places I never would have found alone.
TRUST1_DESC: All users verify their identity for a safer community
TRUST2_DESC: See what others say before connecting
TRUST4_DESC: 24/7 support to help with any issues
CTA_SUBTITLE: Join thousands of helpers and help-seekers in your community
